explains: n. 改选，重选；再次竞选

sentences.en: She comes up for re-election next year.
sentences.cn: 她明年将再度参加竞选。

sentences.en: An improving economy helped set the scene for his re-election.
sentences.cn: 好转的经济为他的再选铺平了道路。

sentences.en: A third of the Senate and the entire House are up for re-election.
sentences.cn: 1/3的参议员和全体众议员将重新选举。
